content.rendered:
Jakub is a Naval Architect and Marine Engineer at AqualisBraemar (Adjusting) with a PhD in Naval Architecture (Universities of Glasgow and Strathclyde) and MEng in Marine Engineering (Technical University of Gdańsk). He specialises in stability, hydrodynamics, energy efficiency of complex systems, post-casualty systems availability, damage survivability and emergency responses in flooding casualties.

Discipline: Naval architecture, Master’s Degree, PhD. CEng.
Specialism: Computational Fluid Dynamics; Corrosion and Erosion; Collision & Grounding; Design – Ship Design; Dynamic Positioning; Finite Element Analysis; Forensic Casualty Investigation; Hull & Machinery; Noise and Vibration; Power Generation and Distribution; Propulsion System; Risk Assessment; Sea Trial; Software and Coding; Stability and Damage Stability; Vessel Structural Strength; Expert Evidence, Arbitration & Litigation Support.

Contact

London | +44 (0) 7766 835 402
